entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
